QuestData.Title: The Winds of Loch Modan
QuestData.Description: Father finished the Skystrider. It's amazing! Once we get the bugs worked out, I'm going to use it to fight for justice, just like you.$B$BI know you've got to move on, and help other people, being a hero and all, but how about a ride? I'm about to take the Skystrider on its first flight, and I'll be honored if you join me. I'll drop you off at Algaz Station.$B$BWhat do you say?
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the Skystrider to Algaz Station and then speak with Mountaineer Stormpike.
QuestData.RewardText: What in blazes WAS that? A flying mechanostrider?$B$BYou know what, I don't want to know. I'm just going to pretend that didn't happen, and we'll be all nice and businesslike.
